name: Katana DATE!
description:
Controls:

  • WASD to Move and Choose buttons
  • W or Space to Jump 
  • Q, Shift, or S+A/D to Roll
  • LMB to slash
  • RMB or E to interact and pickup
  • Space or Enter to press buttons
  • ESC to pause game and open menu

Made for the Katana ZERO Game Jam!

Inspired by the original Katana ZERO game by Askiisoft.

Developer:

  • bibizu

Art:

  • Yuri Kadri
  • kiji

Music:

  • Eko

Find us all at the Katana Zero discord!

Made in Godot
